alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 31 at 12:26AM CDT until July 31 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Arthur County in west central Nebraska... North central Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until midnight MDT. * At 1126 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arthur, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arthur, Lemoyne, Velma, Haythorn Lake, Jensen Lake and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 101 and 135. Highway 92 between mile markers 133 and 136, and between mile markers 165 and 168. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
